item.description:
Do NOT sign up for this clinic unless you are fully committed to arriving BEFORE 5:30. There will be more offerings of this clinic on other days.

The Intermediate Doubles Skills Clinic is part of a series of free Boston Volleyball Meetup clinics for beginners through advanced doubles players. This is your chance to learn doubles!

This intermediate clinic is for active doubles players who already have solid passing skills. If you haven't already played 6 hours of doubles in 2012, then you are not ready for this clinic. We expect you to serve a ball in-bounds 90% of the time. Advanced doubles players are also welcome. We focus on the highlighted intermediate skills listed below. After practicing these skills, you should be able to compete well at BB level or above in local grass doubles tournaments.

The other clinics in this series cover Basic through Advanced skills.

The format of clinics are 80% drills, 20% instruction. Each clinic is two hours long. We run these outdoors on good-weather days only. We'll play doubles after the clinic until sunset.

Coach Matt has been playing doubles for 20 years. He competes at AA level. He has learned volleyball coaching in the HITS and FullSpeed programs. Matt co-runs Meetup QK A/AA Doubles Tournaments with Brian Lee.

Please sign up as an individual. If you wish to bring a guest, please have them register in Meetup and sign themselves up. Meetup and this clinic are free. If you cannot attend, please do us the courtesy of canceling your RSVP, and we will return the favor by not marking you as a no-show.

Please arrive on time or 15 minutes early.

What you should bring:

• Outdoor shoes with nubby tread.

• Your outdoor volleyball. We prefer Spaulding King of the Beach or Wilson Official AVP. Please do not bring indoor volleyballs. Coach will bring extra volleyballs but they will be old.

• Water. There is no source of water near the site.

Car parking in lot off Fulkerson Street. Coming by public transit, take Red Line to Kendall Square or Green Line to Lechmere. From Kendall walk north 7 blocks. From Lechmere walk WSW 9 blocks.

SKILLS LIST

Basic Skills (B level)

1. Serving

2. Body Position and Footwork

3. Bump Passing

4. Bump Setting

5. Roll Shot

 

Intermediate (BB level)

1. Overhand Digging

2. Poking

3. Roll Shot Placement

4. Three-meter hitting (women set for men)

 

Advanced Skills (A level)

1. Reading

2. Diving

3. Overhand Setting

4. Downward Spiking

 

High Advanced Skills (AA level)

1. Blocking

2. Jump Serving

3. Beach Digging

4. Tooling
item.how_to_find_us: Intersection of Fulkerson Street and Charles Street
item.name: Intermediate Volleyball Doubles Skills Clinic
